title: It's the most wonderful time of the year... 'Tis the LIVE Season!
description:
It's the most wonderful time of the year... 'Tis the LIVE Season!
Get ready to embark on this frosty adventure by completing daily missions that will get more challenging every week during this month-long winter expedition.
There will also be special winter themed Gifts to receive during the campaign period to help you jingle all the way to the top of the leaderboard to win rewards each week of the campaign period!

Registration: Registration opens on December 9th and lasts the whole campaign period. The first 500 creators who register will automatically earn 25,000 leaderboard points!

Dates: Wednesday December 11th - Tuesday January 7th

Gameplay:
There will be 5 different Creator leaderboards: Holly, Mistletoe, Tinsel, Evergreen, and Starlight. What leaderboard the Creator is placed on is determined by their LIVE performance in the past 30 days.
Holly: 10K - 200K
Mistletoe: 200K - 500K
Tinsel: 500K - 1.6M
Evergreen: 1.6M - 8M
Starlight: 8M+
You will see an image for each week on the campaign page that discloses what leaderboard you are on and the 'how to win' information -

Rewards:
The leaderboards and missions will reset weekly, which means more of the chance to win rewards!
Please check the campaign page to see your leaderboard's rewards. There is travel and content shoot opportunities for creators in Tinsel, Evergreen, and Starlight leaderboards,

title: [December 2024] Gallery Gift Swap!
description: From now until December 8th creators can earn Gift Swap cards by lighting up their Gallery Gifts. This is an excellent opportunity to add some fun into Gift Gallery gameplay, especially for those creators who have advanced into Round 3 of Ultimate League (since lit Gallery Gifts are worth 1.5x Ultimate League pointsüòè )

title: [December 2024] Delta Force
description:
Time: 12/4 to 12/25
Qualification: play Delta Force LIVE!
Gameplay (see details in the graphic):
Go LIVE with more than 10 unique viewers to receive drops of in-game rewards
Rank up the weekly leaderboard for TikTok Swags and diamonds
1 live min playing Delta Force = 20 points, capped at 8 hours daily
1 short video Delta Force post tagging #DeltaForce = 2,500 points, capped at 1 post daily
1 unique LIVE viewer during Delta Force live = 1 point (unlimited)
Receive diamond rewards based on the accumulated unique viewers playing the game LIVE
Viewers of your Delta Force LIVE can collect in-game rewards based on their engagement
Short video incentive program & post short videos to receive more in-game rewards
